query: (Background: cholangiocarcinoma OR bile duct cancer OR Doc_title: cholangiocarcinoma OR bile duct cancer) AND (Background: IDH1 OR "IDH" OR "IDP" OR "IDCD" OR "IDPC" OR "PICD" OR "HEL-216" OR "HEL-S-26" OR "Isocitrate Dehydrogenase Cytoplasmic" OR Doc_title: IDH1 OR "IDH" OR "IDP" OR "IDCD" OR "IDPC" OR "PICD" OR "HEL-216" OR "HEL-S-26" OR "Isocitrate Dehydrogenase Cytoplasmic")
